name: fso-part11-bloglist
description: This branch contains my **submissions** for the exercises in **Part 5 (Testing React apps)** of the [FullstackOpen course](https://fullstackopen.com/en/).

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:e2e
scripts.build:ui: cd bloglist-frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../bloglist-backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
